de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.insert.util
Class CTMConverter

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.insert.util.CTMConverter

public class CTMConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to transform topic map fragments to CTM or parse CTM fragments an create the corresponding topic map fragment.

The class internal use the CTMTopicMapWriter and CTMTopicMapReader.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Method Detail

toTopicMap

public static org.tmapi.core.TopicMap toTopicMap(java.lang.String ctm,
                                                 org.tmapi.core.TopicMapSystem tms)
                                          throws TMQLRuntimeException
Method transform the given CTM fragment to the corresponding topic map fragment. The method parse the given CTM string with the CTMTopicMapReader and create a new instance of TopicMap by using the given topic map system.

Parameters:
ctm - the CTM fragment
tms - the topic map system used to create a new topic map
Returns:
the new topic map fragment and never null
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if CTM parsing fails

toCTMString

public static java.lang.String toCTMString(org.tmapi.core.TopicMap topicMap)
                                    throws TMQLRuntimeException
Method transform the given topic map fragment to the corresponding CTM fragment. The method serialize the given topic map with the CTMTopicMapWriter.

Parameters:
topicMap - the topic map to serialize
Returns:
the string-represented CTM-fragment
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if topic map fragment can not be serialized

toCTMString

public static java.lang.String toCTMString(java.util.Collection<?> values)
                                    throws TMQLRuntimeException
Method transform the given topic map items to the corresponding CTM fragment. The method serialize the given topic map with the CTMTopicMapWriter.

Parameters:
values - a collection containing all values, to convert as CTM
Returns:
the string-represented CTM-fragment
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if items can not be serialized

getReplacement

private static final java.lang.String getReplacement(java.lang.Object value)
                                              throws TMQLRuntimeException
Internal method which transform the given value of the matches to their CTM-string-representation.

If value is a topic, the CTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is an occurrence, the CTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is an name, the CTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is an association, the CTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is a sequence, the method will called incremental for each element

If value is an atom, the string-representation will be returned.

Parameters:
value - the value to transform
Returns:
the CTM-string-representation
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if serialization fails
